reasons.text: Your laugh makes everything better
The way your eyes sparkle
You always know how to make me smile
How you make my day better just by being in it
The way you light up when talking about things you love
Your kindness to everyone around you
How comfortable I feel being myself around you
You remember little details I mention
Your taste in music always surprises me
The thoughtful questions you ask
How you listen when I talk
Your sense of humor
I can talk to you about anything
You inspire me to be better
Being around you feels like home
You understand me without me having to explain
Your presence calms me
You make me want to be the best version of myself
Your smile could brighten the darkest day
How passionate you get about things you care about
The little things you do without realizing
Your unique perspective on life
The way you care about your friends and family
How you see the good in people
The way you make me feel Loved
How you're always there when I need you
Your creativity and imagination
The energy you bring
The way you make even simple conversations meaningful
How you never give up on what matters to you
